message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.EC, cs.IR, cs.DS 

This paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning) as it proposes a framework for dynamic pricing using deep reinforcement learning. It also involves the use of Markov Decision Process (MDP) which is a common technique in reinforcement learning. Additionally, the paper may also belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as it involves the use of intelligent algorithms to optimize pricing strategies. The sub-category of cs.EC (Economics and Computation) is also likely as the paper deals with pricing strategies in e-commerce platforms. The use of business data to represent states and the definition of a new reward function also suggest that the paper may belong to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) or cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
